description: PST_Unicode is a Unicode character set-based data file used by Microsoft Office Outlook 2003 and later versions to store email messages, calendar events and other items on a local computer. It replaced PST_ANSI as the default format starting with Office Outlook 2003.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: Microsoft Outlook 2003 Personal Folders File (Unicode)
